channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apple : une « expérience spéciale » le 4 mars, pour l’iPhone 17e et le nouveau MacBook pas cher ?
item.description: Apple organise une « expérience spéciale » le 4 mars à New York pour présenter… on ne sait pas trop quoi. Comme toujours, le constructeur ne révèle pas ses futurs produits en avance, mais la possibilité du MacBook « abordable » est dans tous les esprits, tout comme l'iPhone 17e.

item.title: Apple annonce une grande keynote : quelles nouveautés attendre ?
item.description: Après plusieurs semaines de rumeurs, Apple sort du silence et invite la presse à un événement le 4 mars 2026. On attend un nouvel iPhone, et de nouveaux Mac.

item.title: La sécurité n’a pas de prix : ce feu arrière avec radar intégré pour vélo est déstocké à -32%
item.description: Si le vélo est votre mode de déplacement principal, AliExpress propose un feu arrière avec radar intelligent à 67,68 euros au lieu de 99,99 euros : il s'agit du Coospo TR70.

item.title: Microsoft bloque cette option pratique de Windows, mais c’est pour votre bien
item.description: Sur Windows 10 et Windows 11, une mise à jour bloque une fonctionnalité fréquemment utilisée dans certaines conditions. Ce n'est pas un bug.

item.title: 4 of the best Herman Miller office chairs we've ever tested are cut-price in the Presidents' Day sales right now - and for stylish office furniture, nothing else comes close
item.description: The Aeron, Embody, Vantum, and Sayl all get a big price cut in in the Presidents' Day sales

item.title: So many Discord users are flocking to this alternative platform, it's making Stoat crash
item.description: Discord users are so keen to escape age verification plans that they're in danger of suffocating alternative platforms.

item.title: Canada Goose confirms data leak - around 600,000 customers thought to be affected
item.description: Luxury retailer Canada Goose confirms data was leaked, but argues it wasn't breached, as hackers claim a third-party was hit instead.

item.title: The creators of Mixtape want to make a great hangout video game
item.description: For most adventure games, the long-term goal can often focus on solving a grand mystery or chasing a lost artifact of the past. But for the upcoming Mixtape, from publisher Annapurna Interactive, it sets its sights on the misadventures of young friends enjoying their last days together before moving on. It's the type of narrative adventure game that shines a light on how good music can bring people together, and how much fun getting into trouble can be. From developer Beethoven and Dinosaur, the Australian creative team behind The Artful Escape, Mixtape is, in many ways, a tribute to classic '...

item.title: The Penultimate ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Brings Peril and Pain
item.description: ‘In the Name of the Mother’ gives us more of Dunk’s origin story as he faces the greatest test of his life.

item.title: Flapping Airplanes on the future of AI: ‘We want to try really radically different things’
item.description: "We're exploring a different set of tradeoffs."

item.title: Aspen is finally getting a second ski base village. It’s over 10 years in the making
item.description: Developers will soon break ground on the ‘forgotten’ side of Aspen Mountain. After more than a decade of planning, an overlooked side of the ski haven of Aspen, Colorado, will soon be revamped into a new base village.

item.title: X (Twitter) est en panne dans le monde entier
item.description: Depuis 14h00, ce lundi 16 février 2026, les serveurs de X semblent inaccessibles. Des milliers d'internautes font état d'une panne.

item.title: Upgrade to an OLED TV for less than you’d think in the Presidents’ Day sales — LG and Samsung sets are back to Black Friday prices
item.description: We've tested LG and Samsung's budget OLED TVs, and you can't go wrong

item.title: Switch 2 pricing and next PlayStation release could be impacted by memory shortage
item.description: Sony and Nintendo are reportedly feeling squeezed by RAM shortages as demand from AI data centers takes up an increasing share of memory chip production. In response to rising costs and dwindling chip supplies, Sony is considering pushing back the release of its next PlayStation console "to 2028 or even 2029," according to industry sources […]

item.title: Ce nouveau smartphone TCL qui se mue en liseuse est déjà en promo sur Amazon
item.description: Le TCL NXTPAPER 70 Pro 5G, présenté au CES 2026, est un modèle atypique, qui permet de basculer facilement entre un smartphone Android et une liseuse. En ce moment, il se négocie à un tarif plus attractif en passant de 339 euros à 299 euros.

item.title: X is down –here's what we know about the major outage
item.description: A bad start to the week for X

item.title: I'm a certified barista, and my favorite Breville coffee maker is down to a record-low price at Amazon for Presidents' Day
item.description: Enjoy authentic hot or cold-brewed coffee, with a thermal carafe that keeps it at the perfect temperature for over five hours.

item.title: What drone ban? Several of our favorite 'beginner-friendly' DJI drones are currently on sale for record-low prices today
item.description: It's a good time to consider picking up these DJI models

item.title: Walmart's Presidents' Day is filled with best-selling TVs, appliances and Apple devices — here's what's in my shopping cart
item.description: Walmart's Presidents' Day sale is live, and I've found the 21 best deals on best-selling appliances, TVs, Apple devices, and more.

item.title: ChatGPT va passer sous contrôle renforcé de Bruxelles
item.description: Le chatbot IA d'OpenAI va passer sous le régime des très grandes plateformes ou très grands moteurs de recherche du DSA, le règlement européen sur les services numériques, selon Contexte. Un changement de taille qui va le contraindre à respecter de nouvelles obligations de transparence, mais pas seulement.

item.title: After all the hype, some AI experts don’t think OpenClaw is all that exciting
item.description: "From an AI research perspective, this is nothing novel," one expert told TechCrunch.

item.title: La PS6 pourrait être reportée à… 2029
item.description: La PS5 a encore quelques belles années devant elle — et même un peu plus. Les prix toujours plus élevés de la mémoire pourraient en effet pousser Sony à reporter le lancement de sa prochaine console de salon à 2028, voire 2029.

item.title: Demain, l’éclipse de Soleil la plus frustrante de la décennie : pourquoi ce show cosmique se jouera en privé
item.description: Demain, pendant un peu plus de deux minutes, notre Soleil va se transformer en anneau de feu. Et presque personne sur notre Terre ne sera là pour le voir…

item.title: The best Presidents Day deals: Shop Apple, TVs, mattresses, streaming, and more
item.description: Presidents' Day is one of the first major sales of the year and already we've spotted a ton of savings. Here are all the best deals from Amazon, Best Buy, and Walmart.

item.title: Blockchain fintech giant Figure hit by data breach, says 'limited number of files' impacted
item.description: ShinyHunters claims responsibility, says Figure is part of the Okta single sign-on attacks.

item.title: Still struggling with iOS 26 battery life? iOS 27 could fix it soon – but here are 7 ways to boost it now
item.description: iOS 27 will bring battery life improvements, according to a new report. But while you wait, here are 7 tips to try on iOS 26.

item.title: This mini PC with 8GB RAM is small enough to fit in the palm of your hand and at under $100 I can definitely recommend it
item.description: The NUC Box mini PC delivers practical everyday performance in a compact, space saving design for under $100.

item.title: How to watch Australia vs. Sri Lanka in the 2026 T20 World Cup online for free
item.description: How to watch T20 World Cup for free. Live stream Australia vs. Sri Lanka in the 2026 T20 World Cup for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Good Luck, Have Fun, Dont Die cast confesses which apps have them addicted to their phones
item.description: Sam Rockwell, Zazie Beetz, and Michael Peña talk tech fixations and the future of AI in this interview about Gore Verbinski's new movie, "Good Luck, Have Fun, Don't Die."
